text: is a Japanese rock music group that started in 2001. The name RADWIMPS is based on the english words "rad" and "wimp", as such the name can for example mean "excellent coward". ==Members== *Yojiro Noda (July 5, 1985) vocals, guitar. *Akira Kuwahara (April 4, 1985) guitar, the leader. *Yusuke Takeda (May 24, 1985) bass. *Satoshi Yamaguti (March 20, 1985) drum. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Radwimps (2003) * Radwimps 2: Hatten Tojō (2005) * Radwimps 3: Mujintō ni Motte Ikiwasureta Ichimai (2006) * Radwimps 4: Okazu no Gohan (2006) * Altocolony no Teiri (2009) * Zettai Zetsumei (2011) * Batsu to Maru to Tsumi to (2013) * Your Name. (2016) * Human Bloom (2016) * Anti Anti Generation (2018) * Weathering with You (2019) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site (Japanese) * RADWIMPS - MySpace Category:J-pop music groups Category:2001 establishments in Japan Category:Musical groups from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Musical groups established in 2001
title: Radwimps
